name: Foreign Legion: Multi Massacre
description: Foreign Legion: Multi Massacre is the (far too) long awaited follow up to Buckets of Blood. Now you can continue the cartoon-style third person battle online and battle your friends, enemies or even frenemies across 6 maps and various modes.

reviews.review_text: This game is a gem. It's not a game that you sink many hours in, but the time you spend in it is pure joy.  You instantly notice that GRIN were not held back in their creativity and madness. So there was no blown up marketing department to say 'Oh my god, we can't do this!' They just did ;)  Show me another game in which it's an achievement to kill hundreds of dolphins. Ya, we're talking this level of freedom in design.  All that said - i highly recommend getting it, but for full price only if you really want to support GRIN. But with all those sales on Steam, it's just a question of time ;)

Wow, this is one of the best shoot-'em-up action games I have ever played, with beautiful graphics, especially the particle effects. For an only MP game I found myself loving the deep and incredibly fun progression system and interesting maps obviously made by a skilled developer. Although this masterpiece falls a bit short to compete for my GOTY award, it's still worth a buy, or maybe two, to support the developer. I can't wait for Foreign Legion 2! Buy this NOW!
